title: Kotlin - ErgoDocs
summary: Given that Kotlin is predominantly used as a JVM language, please refer to our AppKit Guide for additional resources. We also offer Mosaik, which provides a Kotlin DSL User Interface Tutorial to help you understand and create user interfaces effectively. (See the full Mosaik Intro). For a practical demonstration of how to utilize AppKit in Kotlin, consider reviewing the Ergo Wallet app. This application, developed in Kotlin, provides a valuable case study on effective use of AppKit.

sections.heading: Kotlin#
sections.content:
Given that Kotlin is predominantly used as a JVM language, please refer to our AppKit Guide for additional resources.
We also offer Mosaik, which provides a Kotlin DSL User Interface Tutorial to help you understand and create user interfaces effectively. (See the full Mosaik Intro).
For a practical demonstration of how to utilize AppKit in Kotlin, consider reviewing the Ergo Wallet app. This application, developed in Kotlin, provides a valuable case study on effective use of AppKit.
